articles.author: Caroline Frost
articles.title: Taylor Swift Shakes Off Frozen Hand Mid-Show For “Scotland’s Biggest Ever Stadium Concert” - Deadline
articles.description: 73,000 fans attended what the star told the crowd was the biggest stadium concert in Scottish history.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift wowed the Scottish crowd on her first UK tour date Friday evening, earning five-star reviews across the board for her three-and-a-half-hour performance in Edinburgh.
But the star had to… [+1519 chars]
